name: Mr B Plays the Hits
description:
Mr B Plays the Hits is part game, part musical toy. Fly around as Mr B and explore his tiny world. Play the drums, or make music with the Mr B sequencer. You can also unlock artwork by collecting pollen in a short side-scrolling mini-game.

The download comes with an art/music bundle as well!

You'll get:

- the game for Mac and PC

- the all-new acapella version of the Mr B song, plus the karaoke version to sing along to

- a pack of animated GIFs and transparent PNGs to use however you like! (put Mr B on your Instagram posts!)

- a collection of 10 high-quality phone wallpapers

- a mini-sample pack of the sounds and music from the game, plus some extra beat, noises and loops for you to make your own music with
